title: Which Cigar Would Each of Us Be? - The After Show
itunes:title: Which Cigar Would Each of Us Be? - The After Show
description:
On this episode, we mostly do what one of our listeners suggested in an email. Each of us decided which cigar best represents the other members of the show. Did we manage to keep it positive?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
